channel.title: Trade results problem and adding specials
channel.description:
if this is in the wrong section sorry.
well i am having a problem in the trade screen. When me and another player are about to put our items up for trade. the item turns into another item =\ wut should i do ?
and adding specials can any 1 help me with that because i am not sure if it will add lagg to the server or not. Thank you
